email.subject: Exploring Opportunities at {{cName}}
email.body:
Hello Hiring Team,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is {{name}}, and I am writing to express my interest in {{pName}} position at {{cName}}, With a solid background in both front-end and back-end development, along with a passion for creating innovative solutions, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team.

My experience includes proficiency in various programming languages and frameworks, strong problem-solving skills, and a commitment to delivering high-quality code. I am eager to bring my technical expertise and enthusiasm for development to {{cName}} and contribute to its success.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how my skills align with the needs of your team further.

Warm regards,
{{name}}
